examples.example: 妈妈今天做了美味的苋菜汤，全家都很喜欢。

translate.english: Mother made delicious amaranth soup today, and the whole family likes it very much.

examples.example: 我在菜市场买了一把新鲜的苋菜，准备晚上做个美味的菜肴。

translate.english: I bought a bunch of fresh amaranth in the vegetable market and am planning to make a delicious dish in the evening.

examples.example: 我和朋友们一起去采摘苋菜，度过了一段十分欢乐的时光。

translate.english: I went to pick amaranth with my friends and had a very happy time.
